graph.properties.components

Class HopcroftTarjanSplitComponent<V extends Vertex,E extends Edge<V>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • graph.properties.components.Component<V,E>
      • graph.properties.components.HopcroftTarjanSplitComponent<V,E>
  • Type Parameters:
    V - The vertex type
    E - The edge type

    public class HopcroftTarjanSplitComponent<V extends Vertex,E extends Edge<V>>
extends Component<V,E>
    A component of a graph used in Hopcroft-Tarjan splitting algorithm
    Author:
    Renata
